name: Slime Bunker
description:
You are a lowly slime stationed at a remote arctic outpost. It's full of important machines that allow everyone to survive in such a harsh environment. But these machines weren't really made for the cold—or very well at all really—so they easily get iced up. It's your job to clear off that ice! (And maybe help some folks out along the way?)

words and dots:

Roy Blakely

tunes and sounds:

Matthew Wisniewski

programming support:

Sarah O'Donnell

testing support:
